price: Indeed, it is We Who have sent down the Qur’an to you in stages.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā ʿalayka al-qur'āna tanzīlan
